remarks: If the support of a function is a subset of the support of a finitely supported function, the function is finitely supported.  (Contributed by AV, 2-Jul-2019.)  (Proof shortened by AV, 15-Jul-2019.)
statement: fsuppsssupp $p |- ( ( ( G e. V /\ Fun G ) /\ ( F finSupp Z /\ ( G supp Z ) C_ ( F supp Z ) ) ) -> G finSupp Z ) $.
